item.title: Speeding up Kitchen converges with Squid
item.description: One day, you may find yourself smoking too often or drinking a lot of coffee while waiting for the files to be downloaded during provisioning of Vagrant / Kitchen VMs. E.g: JDK size is ~200 MB and it may take a dozen of minutes to download during the execution of the java recipe. You can save precious seconds of your life with Squid. Though some configuration is required, it wont take more than 5 minutes.
